Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HaNP-2 (natural AMPs; alpha, UCSS1a; 3S=S; hamster neutrophil defensin 2, rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Golden hamster or Syrian hamster,Mesocricetus auratus

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  It contains three disulfide bonds: 1,29; 3,18; 8,28.Activity: Active against S. aureus (50% inhibition, IC50 18.2 ug/ml), S. pyogenes (IC50 6.1 ug/ml), E. faecalis (IC50 12.0 ug/ml), E. coli (IC50 30.4 ug/ml), Salmonella serotype krefeld (IC50 24.3 ug/ml), K. oxytoca (IC50 20.2 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (IC50 25.8 ug/ml), and C. albicans (IC50 38.0 ug/ml).UniProt P81466: you can view AlphaFold predicted structure.Updated 7/2021; 11/2024
Literature Information.Author: Mak P., Wojcik K., Thogersen IB., Dubin A.1996
Literature Information.Title: Isolation, antimicrobial activities, and primary structures of hamster neutrophil defensins.
